mapper.sql:
SELECT T.ID, T.USER_ID, T.USER_NAME, T.MOBILE, T.POSTAL_CODE, T.NATIONAL_CODE, T.PROVINCE_NAME, T.CITY_NAME, T.COUNTY_NAME, T.DETAIL_INFO, T.IS_DEFAULT, T.LONGITUDE, T.LATITUDE, U.NICKNAME FROM MALL_ADDRESS T LEFT JOIN MALL_USER U ON T.USER_ID = U.ID WHERE 1=1
AND U.NICKNAME LIKE '%${params.nickname}%'
AND T.USER_NAME LIKE '%${params.userName}%'
AND T.MOBILE LIKE '%${params.mobile}%'
AND T.USER_ID = #{params.userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MALL_ADDRESS SET IS_DEFAULT = 0 WHERE ID != #{id}; UPDATE MALL_ADDRESS SET IS_DEFAULT = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
